"Shirayuki": "This time, there are specific enemies I want you to subjugate."
"You will have two targets: a \"Volt Remnus\", and a \"Dark Remnus\"."
"Volt Remnus can be found often in Stia's Fringes."
"Dark Remnus has been sighted in Outer Mediola: Sector 2."
"They're both formidable enemies, but they shouldn't be a problem with your abilities."
"Alright, now get out there, and good luck to you."
